title: Flight Simulator 2020 -  Addon spotlight - Van's RV-7 - version 1.0.1
description:
A new airplane has been released for MSFS 2020: the Van RV-7. This two seater aircraft is still under development but I am really impressed already by the quality of the aircraft. The version we will have a short look at is the latest version which got several graphical updates and some new functionality.

If you want to try the aircraft yourself please download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/23192/van-s-rv-7
